```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

bnb <- read.csv('AB_NYC_2019.csv')

bnb[is.na(bnb$room_type),]
n_distinct(bnb$neighbourhood_group)

n_distinct(bnb$room_type)

plot(bnb$latitude, bnb$longitude, col = bnb$neighbourhood)

plot(bnb$latitude, bnb$longitude, col = bnb$neighbourhood_group)
```

```{r}
mean_price <- bnb %>% group_by(neighbourhood) %>% summarise(mean_price = mean(price), 
                                                            latitude = median(latitude), longitude = 
                                                            median(longitude)) 

#plot(mean_price$latitude, mean_price$longitude, col = mean_price$mean_price)

ggplot(data = mean_price, aes(x = latitude, y = longitude, color = mean_price)) + 
  geom_point() + scale_color_gradient(low="blue", high="red")
```
